string.value: After solving the code, I found out there's a clue in Sleepywood! I better go there immediately.
Based on the bizarre-looking statue in Sleepywood, I was enable to find another code. What would this code imply?
After solving the code written on the bizarre-looking statue, I headed over to a small grave.
(Something's engraved on the statue. It seems like a sentence. I should try reading this...)

I'm here as your savior. 
Chosen out of millions of possibilities, and 
have been silently with you from then on out. 
Take the fit body of mine, and engrave your mark on my chest. 
 If you blow on me while standing still. 
 People want you, and gather up in front of me, and they'll have to just pray... 

Who am I?
(This... is the 2nd Code? What does this mean...?? Where am I supposed to go after this?)
(Hmmm ... should I not read this, yet?)
(Based on the code, I found myself standing in front of a small grave in the middle of snow valley. If I deciphered to code right, something should be here...)
